thread.title: Diego Costa sparks more training ground drama after trapping Chelsea teammate in a box
thread.title_full: Diego Costa sparks more training ground drama after trapping Chelsea teammate in a box

title: Diego Costa sparks more training ground drama after trapping Chelsea teammate in a box
text:
1 of 7 Click to reveal the best snaps of mischievous Diego Costa in training 
Diego Costa created more drama during Chelsea training today after a bizarre incident involving a key teammate and a cardboard box. 
Cameras were there to capture the entire incident as Costa, helped by Marcos Alonso and Nemanja Matic, caused another stir. 
CLICK THROUGH THE GALLERY TO REVEAL THE INCIDENT AT CHELSEA'S TRAINING GROUND EARLIER TODAY. Related articles
